content.prompt: Grenville’s warning regarding Santo Domingo (Source 2) was a response to which of the following?

choices.label: The outbreak of yellow fever that decimated Napoleon’s army
The environmental damage caused by the sugar industry
The decimation of the native population by European diseases
The outbreak of a slave revolt led by Toussaint L’Ouverture

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
